item.title: Internet Account Keeps Coming Back after deletion on MacOS
item.description: Today I tried to delete an inactive Internet account on system preference. It was deleted successfully but come back again after 20 seconds. This drives me nuts. I tried these methods, but none of them works. Boot in safe mode, delete account.
